reviewText:
I was disappointed to find that the sword form included on this dvd was not the broadsword as GuangZhi Xing is holding in the picture on the cover. Instead the sword form is with the Tai Chi straight sword.

I did however enjoy the instruction of both forms, the Simplified 24 (hand form) and the 32 Sword form. The material is presented and discussed very clearly and in english.
This is not that easy for someone with no experience at all. It might be useful after taking a few classes to practice with.

this instructional video is by far the best on the market for beginners wanting to learn the movements!  it provides different views of the movement, allowing the trainee to more easily duplicate the action on the screen. highly recommended.
